title: Van Hahn Vegetarian Restaurant
description: Portland vegetarian restaurant serving Vietnamese cuisine. Owned and operated by a Buddhist nun with profits being used support their nearby temple. Makes its own mockmeats. Most dishes are vegan except a few containing milk (steamed buns have milk in the dough, a ranch dressing on the "chicken" salad, and Hershey's kisses chocolate in the candy dish at the counter). Basic decor.
